title: Borders, 1815–25
inscribed: Duplicate of 1958-78-2 (apparently, the two pieces were cut apart - have matching ragged edges).
description: Two borders printed side by side on the length of paper. Central motif is a mirror image of a modified scissors scroll decorated with elements derived from pineapple, bay and palm leaf. This motif is enclosed by black lines ending in Greek Key patterns. Above is a string of leaves, below, a band of grape leaves. Yellow and black on chocolate ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Borders, 1815–25.
1815–25. Block-printed, handmade paper. Gift of Harvey Smith. 1968-111-139.
